channel.title: CVE Feed for forgerock -- access management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for forgerock -- access management

item.title: CVE-2021-4201|2024-09-16T16:43:04.393Z -- forgerock -- access%20management
item.description: Missing access control in ForgeRock Access Management 7.1.0 and earlier versions on all platforms allows remote unauthenticated attackers to hijack sessions, including potentially admin-level sessions. This issue affects: ForgeRock Access Management 7.1 versions prior to 7.1.1; 6.5 versions prior to 6.5.4; all previous versions.

item.title: CVE-2022-24669|2024-09-16T22:25:59.604Z -- forgerock -- access%20management
item.description: It may be possible to gain some details of the deployment through a well-crafted attack. This may allow that data to be used to probe internal network services.

item.title: CVE-2022-24670|2024-09-16T18:08:57.937Z -- forgerock -- access%20management
item.description: An attacker can use the unrestricted LDAP queries to determine configuration entries

item.title: CVE-2023-0582|2024-08-02T05:17:50.097Z -- forgerock -- access%20management
item.description:
Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in ForgeRock Access Management allows Authorization Bypass.
This issue affects access management: before 7.3.0, before 7.2.1, before 7.1.4, through 7.0.2.

item.title: CVE-2023-0582|2024-03-27T17:09:43.769Z -- forgerock -- access%20management
item.description:
Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in ForgeRock Access Management allows Authorization Bypass.
This issue affects access management: before 7.3.0, before 7.2.1, before 7.1.4, through 7.0.2.
